title: Request: Rioter to play with for my 1,000th win
body:
Hello, I'm not sure if this is where I post this request. So I apologize if this is the incorrect place to post it.

I'm currently at 997 wins, so I'm pretty close to 1000. So I was hoping to get a Rioter to play with me for my 1,000th win!

Thanks!

http://gyazo.com/32867e5b05d05893203aab4a3df7ab04
